ygData.subject: Re: Farewell Atlantis
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson walks up to Perseus and puts a hand out to feel where he is exactly.  He confirms that he is up near the front of the ship, by the feel of it s hull,

Tucson walks up to Perseus and puts a hand out to feel where he is exactly.=
  He confirms that he is up near the front of the ship, by the feel of it's=
 hull, and structure of the airtanker.  A narrowed brow shows an air of sus=
picion and still an air of dislike for the Decepticons who had left him wit=
h a bad taste in his mouth and then some.

" It just doesn't seem natural t=
hat a Tsunami would just build up out of nowhere.  Ohhh they talk of peace,=
 but how can we believe a Decepticon's word when all they've ever done was =
destroy whatever they set foot on?   Lord Perseus, I don't want to jump to =
conclusions, and I could be wrong but this doesn't appear to me as an act o=
f Nature alone.  It's as if something or someone wanted to target Atlantis.=
  I'm sorry, but it will be a cold day in the universe before I ever trust =
a Decepticon."  

Being a critical sort, he could not help but express his =
opinion about the Decepticons and the so called peace treaty that was in pr=
ogress. 

" I promise, I will not interfere with any negotiations we may ha=
ve with the opposing sides.  Just - please, do not count on my support when=
 it comes to the Decepticons."  

He continues to stand at the front of the=
 airtanker, trying to listen to get an idea of where they were at the prese=
nt time.
